name: console-control-strings
description: a library of cross-platform tested terminal/console command strings for doing things like color and cursor positioning.  this is a subset of both ansi and vt100.  all control codes included work on both windows & unix-like oses, except where noted.
kwds: a library of cross-platform tested terminal/console command strings for doing things like color and cursor positioning.  this is a subset of both ansi and vt100.  all control codes included work on both windows & unix-like oses, except where noted.
